diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Other causes of progressive myelopathy (spinal cord compression, vitamin B12 deficiency, and hereditary, congenital, and other inflammatory and traumatic myelopathies)
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The diagnosis of HAM/TSP was supported by a positive serological test for HTLV-1 antibodies in serum and CSF, along with characteristic clinical features such as slowly progressive spastic paraparesis, urinary urgency, and longitudinal history of symptoms starting between ages 6 and 12.
